title: Travel Preferences
description: Tracks a user's travel preferences, including home airport code, meal preferences, seating preferences, etc.

xdm:seat.title: Seat
xdm:seat.description: Captures the user's preferred seat type for flights.

xdm:seatSection.title: Seat Section
xdm:seatSection.description: Captures the user's preferred seat sectionfor flights.

xdm:meal.title: Meal
xdm:meal.description: Tracks the user's meal preference, if provided.

xdm:preferredDepartureAirportCode.title: Preferred Departure Airport Code
xdm:preferredDepartureAirportCode.description: Records the user's preferred home/departure airport code.

xdm:ticketDelivery.title: Ticket Delivery
xdm:ticketDelivery.description: Defines the user's preferred ticket delivery method.

xdm:medicalAlerts.title: Medical Alerts
xdm:medicalAlerts.description: Captures any medical alerts for the user.

xdm:roomType.title: Room Type
xdm:roomType.description: Tracks the user's preferred room type.

xdm:smokingRoom.title: Smoking Room
xdm:smokingRoom.description: Flags if the user prefers a smoking room.

xdm:foamPillows.title: Foam Pillows
xdm:foamPillows.description: Captures if the user prefers foam pillows.

xdm:rollAwayBed.title: Roll Away Bed
xdm:rollAwayBed.description: Captures if the user requires a rollaway bed.

xdm:crib.title: Crib
xdm:crib.description: Captures if the user requires a crib.

xdm:earlyCheckIn.title: Early Check-In
xdm:earlyCheckIn.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with early check-in available.

xdm:gym.title: Gym
xdm:gym.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with a gym/fitness room.

xdm:pool.title: Pool
xdm:pool.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with a swimming pool.

xdm:hasRestaurant.title: Has Restaurant
xdm:hasRestaurant.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with a restaurant.

xdm:roomService.title: Room Service
xdm:roomService.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with room service available.

xdm:wheelchairAccessible.title: Wheelchair Accessible
xdm:wheelchairAccessible.description: Tracks if the user requres a wheelchair accessible room.

xdm:visuallyImpairedAccessible.title: Visually Impaired Accessible
xdm:visuallyImpairedAccessible.description: Tracks if the user requres a visually impaired accessible room.

xdm:vehicleType.title: Vehicle Type
xdm:vehicleType.description: Records the user's vehicle type preference.

xdm:smokingVehicle.title: Smoking Vehicle
xdm:smokingVehicle.description: Flags if the user prefers a smoking vehicle.

xdm:manualTransmission.title: Manual Transmission
xdm:manualTransmission.description: Records if a user prefers a manual transmission instead of an automatic transmission.
